query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meals WHERE clientId = 990036) as meal_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drinks WHERE clientId = 990036) as drink_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM body_metrics WHERE clientId = 990036) as metrics_count;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Acm1QzHQhQUgLe.35139a5d2a11 --database CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meals WHERE clientId = 990036) as meal_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drinks WHERE clientId = 990036) as drink_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM body_metrics WHERE clientId = 990036) as metrics_count;
